page.title: 02LIFE STYLE BOY WEEKEND
page.content: On Saturday Dad, my brother and I normally go out to the shops and mum stays at home and puts the dirty washing in the washing machine. We look in shops and sometimes buy things. My brother normally buys fishing things he goes to the toy shop to buy some fishing floats. At home I play with my friend Charles and if he is not in I watch the T.V. Dad is sometimes up in the loft painting it. It is going to be our play room. We have got a toaster which toasts sandwiches and we have them for tea. On Sundays I play with Charles and we play on bikes. For dinner we have roast potatoes, meat, carrots, gravy and sometimes beans. I go to bed at about half past eight.
